author: bimsebasse
name: Loki
description:
Lean, mean and dark theme for Cinnamon.

Font: Droid Sans (sudo apt-get install fonts-droid)
Wallpaper: wstarburst
Icons: works best with square icons, like Faenza/Faience (or Mint's default icon set)

Updates
- May 2, 2013: Updated for Cinnamon 1.8 (1.7.8 to be exact)
- Jan 4, 2013: Had way too much box-shadow if you don't have a dark wallpaper, toned down a bit
- Dec 17, 2012: Improved workspaceOSD
